text:
@carolecadwalla Good morning. I am from the NHS track & trace team. You have had contact with this an individual who has tested positive for coronavirus recently. You are now required to self-isolate for 14 days. I need to know names & contact details...
Or similar. Potential scam? Yes.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
